title: SMC_StringStream2 (FunctionBlock)
text:
FUNCTION_BLOCK SMC_StringStream2 IMPLEMENTS
SMC_ITextStream
This function block reads strings and presents the contents
as a stream of characters to other function blocks such as
SMC_ReadNCFromStream
.

rows.Name: refillData
rows.Comment:
Indicates that a reset is requested.  The data of the stream must
be appended with AppendData from the beginning again.
